thread.title: Take a Look Inside Vetements’ Crazy “Dry Cleaning” Pop-Up Space
thread.title_full: Take a Look Inside Vetements’ Crazy “Dry Cleaning” Pop-Up Space

author: Graeme Campbell
title: Take a Look Inside Vetements’ Crazy “Dry Cleaning” Pop-Up Space

organizations.name: maxfield la  8825 melrose ave.  los angeles

text:
Visit the original post to see all 3 images from this gallery. 
Yesterday, Vetements announced its latest zany venture in the form of a “dry cleaning” pop-up store at Maxfield, LA.
After teasing us with a cleaning bill graphic, the Paris-based collective hinted that a selection of limited-edition items would also be on sale. True to its promise, an exclusive “Beverly Hills” capsule went up for purchase, along with assorted clothing on a revolving rack. The laundromat vibe was pushed further with a window space piled high with dirty garb.
VETEMENTS "DRY CLEANING" @MAXFIELDLA 
A video posted by VETEMENTS (@vetements_official) on Feb 9, 2017 at 8:00pm PST 

VETEMENTS EXCLUSIVE "BEVERLY HILLS" CAPSULE ONLY TONIGHT @MAXFIELDLA 
A photo posted by VETEMENTS (@vetements_official) on Feb 9, 2017 at 7:03pm PST 

The “Beverley Hills” capsule packs some strong ’90s vibes — the designs are slightly reminiscent of old-school United Colors of Benetton numbers.
Check out images of the pop-up space above. Did you manage to make it along? Let us know what went down in the comments below.

MAXFIELD LA 
8825 Melrose Ave. 
Los Angeles, CA 90069 
United States 
In other fashion news, here’s another look at Vetements’ batshit crazy FW17 collection .
